At an estimated 30 million or so users in just one month,

Why the Ã¢â‚¬Å“plus,Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ you might ask? Rumor has it, Google needed

just a bunch of web apps, Google is becoming one large social

About This Book
You donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t have to be new to social media to read this book!
The truth is, according to Facebook stats regarding use, you
may already log in to Facebook at least once daily, and may

This book is for new users of Google+ who are coming
from social networks like Facebook and Twitter. Google+
wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t be exactly what youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re used to, which is why you need
